question: You want to book a hotel recommended to you for a family holiday at the seaside. Write a letter to the hotel manager to make arrangements. • explain what accommodation you require and when you want to stay • ask what will be included in the price • enquire about activities and places of interest near the hotel
text: I am writing with regard to booking at your hotel rerecommended to me by one of my close friends for my coming family holidays and I would  get some information before making a reservation.

As I am planning to visit with my family for the next long weekend holidays, I would like to book a large family room with extra beds that can comfortably accommodate us. Moreover, although I know about some basic information as I got them from my friend, I would appreciate it if you could tell me details of the services such as the internet service or breakfast.

Furthermore, I want to know about the activities that we can take part in during our stay for more fun and adventure. I would also like to enquire if there are any places of interest or markets nearby where we can explore more about the local culture.
I would forward to receiving your mail with information that I enquire about the hotel.
